name: xs-dom
description: A boilerplate for Cycle.js libraries written in TypeScript
author: Tylor Steinberger

scripts.test-node: mocha test/node/*.ts test/node/**/*.ts --require ts-node/register && rm -rf test/node/**/*.js
scripts.build-browser-tests: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --module es2015 --target ES6 ./typings/main.d.ts test/browser/index.ts --outDir ./test/browser/build && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t babelify test/browser/build/test/browser/index.js -o test/bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run test-node && testem ci
scripts.preversion: npm run dist && git commit -m 'chore(dist): build dist/'
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && release patch && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && release minor && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && release major && npm publish --access=public
